hudson.tasks.Shell.command: if [ ! -f localizer-1.9.jar.zip ] then curl http://www.java2s.com/Code/JarDownload/localizer/localizer-1.9.jar.zip > localizer-1.9.jar.zip && unzip localizer-1.9.jar.zip && curl http://central.maven.org/maven2/commons-codec/commons-codec/1.9/commons-codec-1.9.jar > commons-code-1.9.jar && true fi export CLASSPATH=/usr/share/jenkins/webroot/WEB-INF/jenkins-cli.jar:/usr/share/jenkins/webroot/WEB-INF/remoting.jar:/usr/share/jenkins/webroot/WEB-INF/slave.jar:/usr/share/jenkins/webroot/WEB-INF/classes:localizer-1.9.jar:commons-code-1.9.jar:localizer-1.9.jar echo > command.txt java hudson.cli.CLI -s http://localhost:8080 list-jobs | while read LINE do echo >> command.txt echo "cat > src/root/usr/local/src/jobs/.xml <<EOF" >> command.txt java hudson.cli.CLI -s http://localhost:8080 get-job >> command.txt echo >> command.txt echo "EOF" >> command.txt done for LINE in abandonnedsmoke do echo >> command.txt echo "cat > src/root/usr/local/src/nodes/.xml <<EOF" >> command.txt java hudson.cli.CLI -s http://localhost:8080 get-node >> command.txt echo >> command.txt echo "EOF" >> command.txt done echo BEFORE AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA cat command.txt echo AFTER AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
